titles.title: Homefront Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2008
Homefront Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2008
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to allow a deduction for care packages provided for soldiers in combat zones.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Homefront Heroes Tax Relief Act of 2008 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow taxpayers who do not otherwise itemize a deduction from gross income of up to $500 for amounts paid to provide care packages for members of the Armed Forces serving in a combat zone.
